title: Motion of orbiting satellites - compare orbits

content.question: Three identical satellites orbit Earth in the orbits shown in the figure. Satellite <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> has a circular orbit of radius <math alttext="uppercase R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math>, Satellite <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> has a circular orbit of radius <math alttext="2 uppercase R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>R</mi></math>, and Satellite <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> has an elliptical orbit such that the distance between Satellite <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> and the center of Earth varies between <math alttext="uppercase R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math> and <math alttext="2 uppercase R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>R</mi></math>. Let <math alttext="v sub 1, maximum" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="v sub 2, maximum" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="v sub 3, maximum" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></math> be the maximum speeds of Satellites <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, and <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> in their respective orbits. Which of the following correctly compares <math alttext="v sub 1, maximum" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="v sub 2, maximum" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="v sub 3, maximum" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="v sub 1, maximum, is greater than v sub 3, maximum, which is greater than v sub 2, maximum" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v sub 3, maximum, is greater than v sub 1, maximum, which is greater than v sub 2, maximum" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v sub 3, maximum, is greater than v sub 2, maximum, which is greater than v sub 1, maximum" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="v sub 2, maximum, is greater than v sub 3, maximum, which is greater than v sub 1, maximum" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="v sub 3, maximum, is greater than v sub 1, maximum, which is greater than v sub 2, maximum" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mi>max</mi></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>
